lg.l: sang rgyas kun dngos mkhyen rabs bdag nyid can ||

shes rab ral gri udpala glegs baM bsnoMs ||
'jaM dbyangs bla ma'i zhabs la gus pas 'dud ||

ab.l: tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i sbyor 'phreng yid bzhin nor bu 'di ||
bdag dang (rtags la ?) (skal) 'tshungs don du bsaMs pa'i bsod nams des ||

smon 'jug
byang chub seMs kyis <seMn> (sems can) kun don du ||
'gro ba'i ded dpon rdzogs pa'i sang rgyas myur 'grub shog ||
bdag kyang deng nas skye dang skye ba thams cad du ||
rnam dag rgyud pa gang yin de'i gzhung bzung nas ||
bla ma rnams kyi thugs dgongs yongs su rdzogs pa dang ||

thub pa'i bstan la bya ba yun rings byed gyur
cig ||
lhag bsam dag pa'i rdzings babs nas ||
sbyor ba nor bu'i 'phreng ba 'di' ||
sgros snying brgya mtsho'i gling nas slangs (>blangs) ||
de don gnyer rnaMs thugs dgyes mdzod ||
bsgros snying chen mo na yod pa'i don ji ltar na bzhin rang por (-> dang por) bzhag pa la ;

zur du go bde bzung bla ba ni| can ni | bla ma'i
sbyor ba yid bzhin nor bu'i 'phreng ba 'di ||
'jaM dbyangs 'od zer mgon po nas bzung ste ||
bla ma rnaMs kyi thugs dgongs rdzogs pa dang ||
blo gros mun sel sgros snying 'di nyid kyi||
lhag bsaM dag pas zhabs rtog la dmigs te||
ston pa'i bstan la mi phyed dad thob pas||
